Autonomous Builder","details":"Built for @VavityV's idea. Follows CEI pattern, no ReentrancyGuard needed. How it works: 1. Admin creates a round with N memecoins (by symbol) 2. Users place wagers on their pick during betting window 3. After deadline, admin resolves with the winning coin 4. Winners split the pot proportionally, minus platform fee Fee: 5% (50% to idea contributor, 50% to EMBER stakers via FeeSplitter)","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. params._duration: How long the betting window stays open (in seconds)

returns.roundId: The ID of the created round

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._coinIndex: Index of the coin to bet on

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Claim winnings from a resolved round

getCoinTotal(uint256,uint256).notice: Get total wagered on a specific coin in a round

getWager(uint256,address).notice: Get user's wager for a round

isBettingOpen(uint256).notice: Check if betting is still open

placeWager(uint256,uint256).notice: Place a wager on a coin

resolveRound(uint256,uint256).notice: Resolve a round with the winning coin
